title: Voodoo Tactical 01-4277 Nylon BDU Belt
description: Designed to be worn with BDUs or the newer ACU, this fully adjustable nylon belt has a metal buckle with velcro to hold down the tail, resulting in a smooth clean appearance. It is 1 3/4 inches wide.
Size Medium fits waist 32"-34", size Large fits waist 34"-36", size X-Large fits waist 38"-42", size 2XL fits waist 42"-46", size 3XL fits waist 46"-50".
details: {"Is Discontinued By Manufacturer": "No", "Department": "Mens", "Date First Available": "May 13, 2011", "Manufacturer": "Voodoo Tactical"}
